segments.text: How do I know what forms to fill out for unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a special form to apply for unemployment benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I get the form to apply for unemployment benefits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can go online to begin the application process .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What type of information will I have to provide to the Employment Development Office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to be able to say whom you worked for and when .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will they need anything else from me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should be able to provide a layoff notice or proof of severance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should I do after I turn in the application ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to be interviewed over the phone . They will set up a time for you .
segments.speaker: S2
